BodyName: Committee on Governmental Operations, State & Federal Legislation
Comment: Jointly with the Committee on Civil Service and Labor.

Items.Title: Oversight - State of the City Workforce.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - State of the City Workforce.

Items.Title: Jointly with the Committee on Civil Service and Labor

A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the department of citywide administrative services to maintain an interactive webpage providing information on the city government workforce and to publish semiannual reports aggregating and summarizing such information
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring the department of citywide administrative services to maintain an interactive webpage providing information on the city government workforce and to publish semiannual reports aggregating and summarizing such information.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the department of citywide administrative services to provide civil service exams in plain, simple language
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring the department of citywide administrative services to provide civil service exams in plain, simple language.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, legislation amending the Public Officers Law to allow non-citizens to hold civil offices.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Amending the Public Officers Law to allow non-citizens to hold civil offices.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the United States Department of Labor to expand the number of Occupational Safety and Health Administration (OSHA) authorized outreach trainers in New York City’s ten designated languages.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: De La Rosa, Bottcher, Menin, Salaam, Cabán, Moya and Dinowitz
